articles.description: Premier League top-scorer Erling Haaland has had a month without competitive football after Norway missed out on the World Cup, but returned with a bang in the EFL Cup
articles.content:
Manchester City striker Erling Haaland has reminded the Premier League he and his team-mates are ready to return with a bang after scoring against Liverpool in the EFL Cup.

articles.title: Hotline callers say Rangers must show more transfer urgency - Daily Record
articles.description: Gavin Berry manned the phone and found there wasn't much festive cheer among the Ibrox legions despite continuing their winning streak under new boss Beale.

articles.title: Brentford head coach Thomas Frank signs new contract until 2027 - Sky Sports
articles.description: Brentford head coach Thomas Frank has signed a new contract until 2027, the club have announced.
articles.content:
Brentford head coach Thomas Frank has signed a new contract, the club have announced.
